text.title: Boxing referee Frank Cappuccino dies aged 86
text.head: Boxing referee Frank Cappuccino dies aged 86
Sources

list.item: John F. Morrison. "Frank Cappuccino, 86, legendary boxing referee for 50 years" — Philadelphia Media Network , June 10, 2015
